summary: YEAR 2000 DODGE GRAND CARAVAN - SERPENTINE BELT TENSIONER FAILED RESULTING IN SHREDDED BELT AND TOWING. VAN HAD ONLY APPROXIMATELY 47,500 MILES.   REPAIRED AT GOODYEAR FOR APPROX. $200 (INCLUDING NEW BELT) WHO INDICATED THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM SUCH THAT THE DODGE DEALER HAD MORE THAN 15 IN STOCK.  FORTUNATELY THIS OCCURRED NEAR A POLICE STATION WHERE MY WIFE GOT ASSISTANCE (SINCE STEERING, ETC. HAD NO POWER AND NOT ON THE HIGHWAY OR RUSH HOUR TRAFFIC WHICH WOULD HAVE BEEN HAZARDOUS.  I HAVE ALSO READ OTHER COMPLAINTS FROM OWNERS WITH THIS SAME ISSUE.  *AK
